feed.title: Mattermost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Mattermost: v10.3.4
entry.content: Mattermost Platform Release 10.3.4 contains low to high severity level security fixes.

entry.title: New release for Mattermost: v10.4.3
entry.content: Mattermost Platform Release 10.4.3 contains low to high severity level security fixes.

entry.title: New release for Mattermost: v10.5.1
entry.content: Mattermost Platform Release 10.5.1 is the latest Extended Support Release and contains a Compliance Export overhaul as well as other improvements, bug fixes and breaking changes.

entry.title: New release for Mattermost: v9.11.9
entry.content: Mattermost Platform Extended Support Release 9.11.9 contains low to high severity level security fixes.

entry.title: New release for Mattermost: v10.6.0
entry.content: Mattermost Platform Release 10.6.0 contains multiple new improvements and bug fixes, as well as a new minimum PostgreSQL version of v13+.
